languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, вы... просили о помощи? Простите, я плохо помню, что делал и с кем говорил, когда появилась Аделина". {n}Лицо Вайса осунулось, но потусторонний взор неугасающими искрами теплится за обветшалыми свитками.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Если закомпличен add_SolveWeissProblem для Obj2_SoulThread
спикер здесь и далее ChoirMaster

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы... просили о помощи? Простите, я плохо помню, что делал и с кем говорил, когда появилась Аделина". {n}Лицо Заккари Вайса осунулось, щеки впали. И лишь потусторонний взор неугасающими искрами теплится за обветшалыми свитками.{/n}

languages.translation_comment:
Если закомпличен add_SolveWeissProblem для Obj2_SoulThread
спикер здесь и далее ChoirMaster

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы... просили о помощи? Простите, я плохо помню, что делал и с кем говорил, когда появилась Аделина". {n}Лицо Вайса осунулось, но потусторонний взор неугасающими искрами теплится за обветшалыми свитками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, did you... ask for help? My apologies; I only have a vague memory of what I was doing and who I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark of his otherworldly gaze is still there, glowing behind the timeworn scrolls.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, did you... ask for help? My apologies; I only have a vague memory of what I was doing and who I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark of his otherworldly gaze is still there, glowing behind the timeworn scrolls.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and who I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark of his otherworldly gaze is still there, glowing behind the timeworn scrolls.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie. Auriez-vous... demandé de l'aide ? Toutes mes excuses, je n'ai qu'un vague souvenir de ce que je faisais et de la personne à qui je parlais quand Adeline est apparue. » {n}Le visage de Weisz est creusé, mais dans son regard, derrière les parchemins usés par le temps, brille toujours la même étincelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie. Auriez-vous... demandé de l'aide ? Toutes mes excuses, je n'ai qu'un vague souvenir de ce que je faisais et de la personne à qui je parlais quand Adeline est apparue. » {n}Le visage de Weisz est creusé, mais dans son regard, derrière les parchemins usés par le temps, brille toujours la même étincelle.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿Ha... pedido ayuda? Lo siento. Me temo que solo tengo un vago recuerdo de lo que hacía y con quién hablaba cuando apareció Adeline». {n}El rostro de Weisz está hundido, pero la chispa de su mirada sigue reluciendo tras los gastados pergaminos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿Ha... pedido ayuda? Lo siento. Me temo que solo tengo un vago recuerdo de lo que hacía y con quién hablaba cuando apareció Adeline». {n}El rostro de Weisz está hundido, pero la chispa de su mirada sigue reluciendo tras los gastados pergaminos.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下。助けを…呼んでおられたのですか？申し訳ありません。アデリーンが姿を現して、自分の行動や話していた相手はボンヤリとしか思い出せないのです」{n}ワイズの表情は沈んでいるが、時の経た巻物の背後にある不滅の火花は、今もなおそこにある。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下。助けを…呼んでおられたのですか？申し訳ありません。アデリーンが姿を現して、自分の行動や話していた相手はボンヤリとしか思い出せないのです」{n}ワイズの表情は沈んでいるが、時の経た巻物の背後にある不滅の火花は、今もなおそこにある。{/n}

languages.text: “大人，您之前……是不是想要找我帮忙？我很抱歉。我只能模糊记得艾德琳出现的时候我在做什么，在和谁说话。”{n}威茨的脸凹陷下去，但古老的羊皮纸后面依然散发着不灭的光芒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，您之前……是不是想要找我帮忙？我很抱歉。我只能模糊记得艾德琳出现的时候我在做什么，在和谁说话。”{n}威茨的脸凹陷下去，但古老的羊皮纸后面依然散发着不灭的光芒。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Habt Ihr ... um Hilfe gebeten? Verzeiht. Ich habe nur eine vage Erinnerung daran, was ich getan und mit wem ich gesprochen habe, als Adeline erschien." {n}Weisz' Gesicht ist eingefallen, aber derunsterbliche Funke erstrahlt noch immer hinter den alten Schriftrollen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Habt Ihr ... um Hilfe gebeten? Verzeiht. Ich habe nur eine vage Erinnerung daran, was ich getan und mit wem ich gesprochen habe, als Adeline erschien." {n}Weisz' Gesicht ist eingefallen, aber derunsterbliche Funke erstrahlt noch immer hinter den alten Schriftrollen.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Yardım mı... İstemiştiniz? Kusuruma bakmayın. Adeline'i gördüğümde ne yaptığımı, kimle konuştuğumu hayal meyal hatırlıyorum." {n}Weisz'ın yüzü çökmüş ancak yıpranmış tomarların ardındaki o ebedî kıvılcım hâlâ yerinde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Did you... ask for help? My apologies. I have only a vague recollection of what I was doing and whom I was talking to when Adeline appeared." {n}Weisz's face is sunken, but the undying spark behind the time-worn scrolls is still there.{/n}
